meanings.definition: The process of making something or someone more feminine.
meanings.sent1: The feminization of the workplace led to more women being hired.
meanings.sent2: The feminization of the room was evident in the pink decor and floral patterns.
meanings.sent3: The feminization of the car with a bow on the hood made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her feminization of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The feminization of the outfit with a flowy skirt and pastel colors was stunning.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a feminine quality or appearance to something.
meanings.sent1: His feminization of the character in the play added depth to the story.
meanings.sent2: The feminization of the cake with pink frosting made it perfect for the party.
meanings.sent3: The feminization of the dog with a cute bow made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her feminization of the song with delicate vocals touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The feminization of the room with soft lighting created a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The state of being made or becoming more feminine.
meanings.sent1: The feminization of his appearance through makeup and clothing was noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The feminization of the atmosphere with flowers and candles was lovely.
meanings.sent3: The feminization of the party with pink decorations was a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her feminization of the office space with elegant touches impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The feminization of the event with a focus on beauty and grace was enchanting.
